sentences: Dayve Hawk (born 1981), better known by his stage name Memory Tapes, is an American singer-songwriter and record producer, and the former frontman of the Philadelphia-based band, Hail Social.
The live shows in 2010 were with a drummer, Matt Maraldo, and a backing track.
On October 2, 2012, Hawk released the first single from his third album, Grace/Confusion, which was released on December 4, 2012.
Hawk lives in Shamong Township, New Jersey with his wife and two daughters.
The Hiss We Missed (as Memory Cassette) (2008)
